reader.sql: select usercenter,dbsqdh,dbsq_date,kjkm,cbzx,sysdate as cjsj from ${dbSchemal3}in_dbsqdxx where 1=1
select xuh,usercenter,dbsqdh,zzlx,ljh,sbsl,sysdate as cjsj from ${dbSchemal3}in_dbsqdxx where 1=1
select dingdh,'P' as DINGDLX,gysdm,leix,'PP' as chullx,'OEDIPP' as EDITOR,current_timestamp as EDIT_TIME,WENJMC,WENJLJ from ${dbSchemal3}in_ddxx where 1=1

select t_order_id_seq.nextval as id,usercenter,dingdh,lingjbh,gysdm,leix,yhqs_date,yhjs_date,xiehztbh, ckdm,dhcj,shul,danw,uabzlx,ucbzlx,ucrl,uaucgs,jf_date,zhwhr,zhwhsj,lujbh,'PP' as gonghlx,'OEDIPP' as EDITOR,current_timestamp as EDIT_TIME,WENJMC,WENJLJ from ${dbSchemal3}in_ddxx where 1=1

select usercenter, lingj, xhd, substr(xhd, 1, 5) as fenpqbh, '0' as xiaohbl, '2' as biaos, (select y.shengcxbh from ${dbSchemal3}ckx_fenpq y where y.usercenter = t.usercenter and y.fenpqh = substr(t.xhd, 1, 5)) as shengcxbh, 'interface' as creator, sysdate as create_time, WENJMC, WENJLJ from ${dbSchemal3}in_xhdljckx t where 1=1
select usercenter, chejbhzz, shengcxbhzz, chejbhhz, shengcxbhhz, shengcptbh, lcdv from ${dbSchemal3}ckx_chexpt WHERE 1=1

select xunhbm, usercenter, lingjbh, gonghms, xiaohd, cangkdm, dinghck, lujdm, umlx, uclx, umljsl, umzucgs, ucrl, cmj, cjmax, dangqxhgm, jisxhgm, xiafxhgm, shifzdfs, zuidyhl, shengxzt, dongjjdzt, leix, creator, to_char(create_time,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:MI:SS.ff') as create_time, to_char(jissj,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:MI:SS.ff') as jissj, weihr, to_char(weihsj,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:MI:SS.ff') as weihsj, gongysbh, jihydm, shifyjsyhl, chanx, kehd, xianbyhlx, yancsxbz, jianglms from ${dbSchemal3}xqjs_kanbxhgm where 1=1 and shengxzt in ('1','2')
SELECT GONGYXHD, CHESSL, PIANYSJ, LIUSH, GONGYBS, BIAOS, ZUH ，SHENGCXBH FROM ${dbSchemal3}CKX_GONGYXHD WHERE 1=1 and biaos!=2

SELECT USERCENTER, LINGJBH, XIAOHDBH, WULBH, FENPQBH, SHENGCXBH, PEISLXBH, QIANHCBS, JIPBZWZ, SHENGXR, JIESR, GUANLYBH, TIQJSXHBL, XIAOHBL, GONGYSBH, SHUNXGLBZ, ZIDFHBZ, XIANBYHLX, YANCSXBZ, BEIHDBZ, XIAOHCBH, XIAOHCCXBH, YUANXHDBH, ANQKCTS, ANQKCS, XIANBLLKC, YIFYHLZL, JIAOFZL, XITTZZ, PDSBZ, BIAOS, ZHONGZZL, ZUH ,GONGYBS FROM ${dbSchemal3}CKX_LINGJXHD WHERE 1=1 and biaos!='2'

exchange-config.caption: OUT019未来几日剔除休息时间

reader.sql: SELECT USERCENTER, CHANXCK, GONGZR, SHUNXH, RIQ, SHIJDKSSJ, SHIJDJSSJ, SHIJCD FROM ${dbSchemal3}CKX_TICXXSJ WHERE 1=1
SELECT USERCENTER,CHANX, to_char(GONGZR,'yyyy-MM-dd') as GONGZR, XIAOHSJ, to_char(JUEDSK,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:MI:SS') as JUEDSK,rownum RN FROM ${dbSchemal3}CKX_GONGZSJMB WHERE 1=1
SELECT USERCENTER,GONGYSBH,LINGJBH,XUH, SHENGXSJ,SHIXSJ,UCBZLX,UCRL,UABZLX, UAUCGS,GAIB,NEIC FROM ${dbSchemal3}CKX_LINGJGYSLSBZ WHERE 1=1
SELECT USERCENTER, SHENGCXBH, CHANXZBH, SHENGCJP, WEILSCJP, QIEHSJ, CHULTS, BIAOS, CPSHENGCJP, FLAG FROM ${dbSchemal3}CKX_SHENGCX WHERE 1=1

select usercenter, gcbh, leix, gonghlx, gongsmc, diz, youb, lianxr, dianh, chuanz, beihzq, fayzq, kacbztj, songhzdpc, songhzxpc, neibgys_cangkbh, edzzl, bodfdxs, fayd, neibyhzx, biaos from ${dbSchemal3}ckx_gongys where 1=1

select usercenter, lingjbh, zhongwmc, fawmc, lingjlx, lingjsx, jihy, danw, zhizlx, to_char(kaisrq,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:MI:SS') kaisrq, to_char(jiesrq,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:MI:SS') jiesrq, zhuangcxs, anqm, lingjzl, biaos, guanjljjb, dinghcj, gongybm, zongcldm, to_char(diycqysj,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:MI:SS') diycqysj, wuly, zhijy, pcjhy, wlgyy from ${dbSchemal3}ckx_lingj where 1=1 and biaos!= 2

select usercenter, lingjbh, cangkbh, zickbh, yuanckbh, xiehztbh, anqkcts, anqkcsl, zuidkcts, zuidkcsl, dingdbdzl, dingdzzzl, yijfzl, xittzz, danqkbh, danqkw, zuidsx, zuixxx, jistzz, zuixqdl, shifxlh, beiykbh, dingzkw, usbzlx, usbzrl, uclx, ucrl, fifo, zidfhbz, zuh from ${dbSchemal3}ckx_lingjck where 1=1
select LIUSH,USERCENTER,XUNHBM,YUANXHBM, LINGJBH,CANGKBH,XIAOHD,MUDDLX, MOS,YUANMS,SHIFKBQH,ZHUANGT FROM ${dbSchemal3}CKX_MSQHB WHERE 1=1
select usercenter,xiehztbzh, tongsjdcs, chulsj, biaos, wulgyyz from ${dbSchemal3}ckx_xiehztbz WHERE 1=1

exchange-config.caption: 订单明细所有订单：既定、预告

reader.sql: SELECT ID, X.DINGDH, LINGJBH, X.USERCENTER, X.GONGYSDM, X.GONGYSLX, TO_CHAR(YAOHQSRQ, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS YAOHQSRQ, TO_CHAR(YAOHJSRQ, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS YAOHJSRQ, CANGKDM, XIEHZT, FAHD, DINGHCJ, SHUL, DANW, UABZLX, UABZUCLX, UABZUCSL, UABZUCRL, TO_CHAR(FAYRQ, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS FAYRQ, TO_CHAR(JIAOFRQ, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS JIAOFRQ, ZHUANGT, YUGSFQZ, LEIX, LUJDM, JIHYZ, ZUIHWHR, TO_CHAR(ZUIHWHSJ, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS ZUIHWHSJ, JISSL, GONGHLX, YIJFL, YIZZL, YAOHLGSZL, YAOHLGSYJF, YAOHLGSYZZ, YIJFLDDMX, YIZZLDDMX, TO_CHAR(SHID, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS SHID, TO_CHAR(ZUIZDHSJ, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS ZUIZDHSJ, TO_CHAR(ZUIWDHSJ, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS ZUIWDHSJ, TO_CHAR(XIAOHSJ, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS XIAOHSJ, XIAOHCBHSJ, XIAOHCSXSJ, XIEHD, XIANBYHLX, USBAOZLX, USBAOZRL, XIAOHCH, XIAOHCCXH, CHANX, XIAOHD, FENPXH, X.ACTIVE, KANBXHBM, TANGC, PAICZT, GCBH, BEIHSJ2, LINGJMC, GONGSMC, NEIBYHZX, PCKAISSJ, PCJIESSJ, PCEDITOR, PCEDIT_TIME FROM ${dbSchemal3}XQJS_DINGDMX X JOIN ${dbSchemal3}XQJS_DINGD D ON D.DINGDH = X.DINGDH AND D.USERCENTER like '%'||X.USERCENTER||'%' WHERE X.ZHUANGT = '4' AND D.DINGDZT = '4' AND (D.DINGDLX <> '3' AND D.DINGDLX <> '5' AND D.DINGDLX <> '6' AND D.DINGDLX <> '7' AND D.DINGDLX <> '8') AND X.EDIT_TIME BETWEEN (SELECT B.LASTCPLTIME FROM IN_ZIDB B WHERE B.INBH = '1230') AND SYSDATE

SELECT ID, dm.DINGDH, LINGJBH, dm.USERCENTER, dm.GONGYSDM, dm.GONGYSLX, to_char(YAOHQSRQ,'yyyy-MM-dd Hh24:Mi:ss') as YAOHQSRQ, to_char(YAOHJSRQ,'yyyy-MM-dd Hh24:Mi:ss') as YAOHJSRQ, CANGKDM,XIEHZT, FAHD, DINGHCJ, SHUL, DANW, UABZLX, UABZUCLX, UABZUCSL, UABZUCRL, to_char(FAYRQ,'yyyy-MM-dd Hh24:Mi:ss') as FAYRQ, to_char(JIAOFRQ,'yyyy-MM-dd Hh24:Mi:ss') as JIAOFRQ, ZHUANGT, YUGSFQZ, LEIX, LUJDM, JIHYZ, ZUIHWHR, to_char(ZUIHWHSJ,'yyyy-MM-dd Hh24:Mi:ss') as ZUIHWHSJ, JISSL,GONGHLX, YIJFL, YIZZL, YAOHLGSZL, YAOHLGSYJF, YAOHLGSYZZ, YIJFLDDMX, YIZZLDDMX, to_char(SHID,'yyyy-MM-dd Hh24:Mi:ss') as SHID, to_char(ZUIZDHSJ,'yyyy-MM-dd Hh24:Mi:ss') as ZUIZDHSJ, to_char(ZUIWDHSJ,'yyyy-MM-dd Hh24:Mi:ss') as ZUIWDHSJ, to_char(XIAOHSJ,'yyyy-MM-dd Hh24:Mi:ss') as XIAOHSJ, XIAOHCBHSJ,XIAOHCSXSJ, XIEHD, XIANBYHLX, USBAOZLX, USBAOZRL, XIAOHCH, XIAOHCCXH, CHANX, XIAOHD, FENPXH, dm.ACTIVE, KANBXHBM, TANGC, PAICZT ,GCBH ,BEIHSJ2,LINGJMC,GONGSMC, NEIBYHZX,PCKAISSJ,PCJIESSJ,PCEDITOR,PCEDIT_TIME FROM ${dbSchemal3}XQJS_DINGDMX dm INNER JOIN ${dbSchemal3}XQJS_DINGD d ON dm.dingdh=d.dingdh where dm.Zhuangt='4' and d.Dingdzt='4' and( d.DINGDLX='5'OR d.DINGDLX='6') AND TO_CHAR(d.EDIT_TIME,'yyyymmddHH24MIss') BETWEEN (SELECT TO_CHAR(i.LASTCPLTIME, 'yyyymmddHH24MIss') FROM IN_ZIDB i WHERE i.INBH = '1620') and to_char(sysdate,'yyyymmddHH24MIss')

SELECT ID, dm.DINGDH, LINGJBH, dm.USERCENTER, dm.GONGYSDM, dm.GONGYSLX, to_char(YAOHQSRQ,'yyyy-MM-dd Hh24:Mi:ss') as YAOHQSRQ, to_char(YAOHJSRQ,'yyyy-MM-dd Hh24:Mi:ss') as YAOHJSRQ, CANGKDM,XIEHZT, FAHD, DINGHCJ, SHUL, DANW, UABZLX, UABZUCLX, UABZUCSL, UABZUCRL, to_char(FAYRQ,'yyyy-MM-dd Hh24:Mi:ss') as FAYRQ, to_char(JIAOFRQ,'yyyy-MM-dd Hh24:Mi:ss') as JIAOFRQ, ZHUANGT, YUGSFQZ, LEIX, LUJDM, JIHYZ, ZUIHWHR, to_char(ZUIHWHSJ,'yyyy-MM-dd Hh24:Mi:ss') as ZUIHWHSJ, JISSL,GONGHLX, YIJFL, YIZZL, YAOHLGSZL, YAOHLGSYJF, YAOHLGSYZZ, YIJFLDDMX, YIZZLDDMX, to_char(SHID,'yyyy-MM-dd Hh24:Mi:ss') as SHID, to_char(ZUIZDHSJ,'yyyy-MM-dd Hh24:Mi:ss') as ZUIZDHSJ, to_char(ZUIWDHSJ,'yyyy-MM-dd Hh24:Mi:ss') as ZUIWDHSJ, to_char(XIAOHSJ,'yyyy-MM-dd Hh24:Mi:ss') as XIAOHSJ, XIAOHCBHSJ,XIAOHCSXSJ, XIEHD, XIANBYHLX, USBAOZLX, USBAOZRL, XIAOHCH, XIAOHCCXH, CHANX, XIAOHD, FENPXH, dm.ACTIVE, KANBXHBM, TANGC, PAICZT ,GCBH ,BEIHSJ2,LINGJMC,GONGSMC, NEIBYHZX,PCKAISSJ,PCJIESSJ,PCEDITOR,PCEDIT_TIME FROM ${dbSchemal3}XQJS_DINGDMX dm INNER JOIN ${dbSchemal3}XQJS_DINGD d ON dm.dingdh=d.dingdh where dm.Zhuangt='4' and d.Dingdzt='4' and( d.DINGDLX='3' OR d.DINGDLX='7' OR d.DINGDLX='8') AND TO_CHAR(d.EDIT_TIME,'yyyymmddHH24MIss') BETWEEN (SELECT TO_CHAR(i.LASTCPLTIME,'yyyymmddHH24MIss') FROM IN_ZIDB i WHERE i.INBH = '1770') and to_char(sysdate,'yyyymmddHH24MIss')

exchange-config.caption: KD订单明细（KD订单：既定、预告）

reader.sql: SELECT ID, dm.DINGDH, LINGJBH, dm.USERCENTER, dm.GONGYSDM, dm.GONGYSLX, to_char(YAOHQSRQ,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:Mi:SS') as YAOHQSRQ, to_char(YAOHJSRQ,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:Mi:SS') as YAOHJSRQ, CANGKDM,XIEHZT, FAHD, DINGHCJ, SHUL, DANW, UABZLX, UABZUCLX, UABZUCSL, UABZUCRL, to_char(FAYRQ,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:Mi:SS') as FAYRQ, to_char(JIAOFRQ,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:Mi:SS') as JIAOFRQ, ZHUANGT, YUGSFQZ, LEIX, LUJDM, JIHYZ, ZUIHWHR, to_char(ZUIHWHSJ,'yyyy-MM-dd Hh24:Mi:ss') as ZUIHWHSJ, JISSL,GONGHLX, YIJFL, YIZZL, YAOHLGSZL, YAOHLGSYJF, YAOHLGSYZZ, YIJFLDDMX, YIZZLDDMX, to_char(SHID,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:Mi:SS') as SHID, to_char(ZUIZDHSJ,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:Mi:SS') as ZUIZDHSJ, to_char(ZUIWDHSJ,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:Mi:SS') as ZUIWDHSJ, to_char(XIAOHSJ,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:Mi:SS') as XIAOHSJ, XIAOHCBHSJ,XIAOHCSXSJ, XIEHD, XIANBYHLX, USBAOZLX, USBAOZRL, XIAOHCH, XIAOHCCXH, CHANX, XIAOHD, FENPXH, dm.ACTIVE, KANBXHBM, TANGC, PAICZT ,GCBH ,BEIHSJ2,LINGJMC,GONGSMC FROM ${dbSchemal3}XQJS_DINGDMX_Kdr dm INNER JOIN ${dbSchemal3}XQJS_DINGD d ON dm.dingdh=d.dingdh where dm.Zhuangt='4' and d.Dingdzt='4' AND TO_CHAR(d.EDIT_TIME,'yyyymmddHH24MIss') BETWEEN (SELECT TO_CHAR(i.LASTCPLTIME, 'yyyymmddHH24MIss') FROM IN_ZIDB i WHERE i.INBH = '1600') and to_char(sysdate,'yyyymmddHH24MIss')

select usercenter, fenpqh, lingjbh, gongysbh, shengcxbh, lujbh, lujmc, fahd, waibms, wjianglms, wshengxsj, gongyfe, zhidgys, jiaofm, beihzq, yunszq, gcbh, xiehztbh, songhpc, beihsjc, mudd, dinghck, mos2, jianglms2, shengxsj2, cangkshpc2, cangkshsj2, cangkfhsj2, beihsj2, ibeihsj2, pbeihsj2, xianbck, mos, jianglms, shengxsj, cangkshpc, cangkshsj, cangkfhsj, beihsj, ibeihsj, pbeihsj, zhizlx, gongyslx, dinghcklx, wulgyyz2, wulgyyz1, wulgyyz from ${dbSchemal3}ckx_wullj where 1=1

select usercenter, gongysbh, lingjbh, gongyhth, gongyfe, youxq, fayd, to_char(shengxsj,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:MI:SS') as shengxsj, to_char(shixsj,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:MI:SS') as shixsj, zuixqdl, cankfz, zhijcjbl, shifyzpch, shifsxgl, ucbzlx, ucrl, uabzlx, uaucgs, gaib, neic, shifczlsbz, biaos, creator, create_time, editor, edit_time from ${dbSchemal3}ckx_lingjgys where 1=1
SELECT USERCENTER,XIEHZTBH,GCBH, TO_CHAR(FACSJ,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') FACSJ, TO_CHAR(DAOHSJ,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') DAOHSJ, XUH,ZUH FROM ${dbSchemal3}CKX_YUNSSK WHERE 1=1
select lujbh, lujmc, usercenter, gongysbh, fahd, mudd, jiaofm, beihzq, panysj, creator, create_time, editor, edit_time from ${dbSchemal3}ckx_waibwl where 1=1

select lujbh, xuh, wuldbh, wuldmc, shifjk, guanjdbs, jihdhsysj, gcbh, yunsms, beihzq, yunssj, shengxbs, TO_CHAR(shengxrq, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') shengxrq, yaohlzkbs, usercenter from ${dbSchemal3}ckx_waibwlxx where 1=1
SELECT USERCENTER,CANGKBH,FENPQHCK,MOS, CANGKSHPCF,CANGKSHSJ,CANGKFHSJ, BEIHSJ,IBEIHSJ,PBEIHSJ,SHIFZDBH, SHENGXBS,ZUH FROM ${dbSchemal3}CKX_CANGKXHSJ WHERE 1=1

select usercenter, diaobsqdh, to_char(diaobsqsj,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:MI:SS') as diaobsqsj, banc, huijkm, chengbzx, beiz, zhuangt, creator, create_time, editor, edit_time, active from ${dbSchemal3}xqjs_diaobsq where 1=1 and zhuangt='30'

select xuh, usercenter, cangkbh, zickbh, diaobdh, to_char(shengxsj,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:MI:SS') as shengxsj, diaobsqdh, lingjbh, lux, kucsl, shenbsl, shipsl, zhixsl, zhongzsl, shifdbz, shifdcjf, zhuangt, active from ${dbSchemal3}xqjs_diaobmx where 1=1 and zhuangt='30'
select wuldbh, wuldmc, wuldlx, shunxh, quy, creator, create_time, editor, edit_time, biaos from ${dbSchemal3}ckx_yunswld where 1=1
SELECT BAOZLX, CHANGD, KUAND, GAOD, BAOZZL, CAIZ, BAOZMC, SHIFHS, LEIB, ZHEDGD, DUIDCS, BAIFFX, BIAOS FROM ${dbSchemal3}CKX_BAOZ WHERE 1=1
select peislx, peislxmc, baozlx, baozsl, zuicddcws, tongbjpbs, shangxd, peitsxbs, beihtqq, xiaohccxc, shifgj, beiz, shifbhd, cangkbh, biaos, zickbh, wlgyy from ${dbSchemal3}ckx_peislb where 1=1
select banc, usercenter, riq, xingq, nianzq, zhoux, nianzx, xis, shifjfr, shifgzr, biaos, creator, create_time, editor, edit_time from ${dbSchemal3}ckx_calendar_version where 1=1
select bianzh, xingqxh, xuh, kaissj, jiezsj, ban, tiaozsj, creator, create_time, editor, edit_time, biaos from ${dbSchemal3}ckx_calendar_team where 1=1
select usercenter, appobj, bianzh, rilbc, beiz, biaos, weilbzh, shengxsj, creator, create_time, editor, edit_time from ${dbSchemal3}ckx_calendar_group where 1=1
select usercenter, shengcxbh, xiaohcbh, riq, tangc, to_char(kaisbhsj, 'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:MI:SS') kaisbhsj, to_char(chufsxsj, 'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:MI:SS') chufsxsj from ${dbSchemal3}ckx_xiaohcyssk where 1=1
select usercenter, lingjbh, fenpqh, qid, qidlx, mos, shengxbs, jianglms, jianglmssxsj, shengcxbh, zick, zuh zuh from ${dbSchemal3}ckx_shengcx_xianb where 1=1
select usercenter, lingjbh, xianbh, yuanbh, bianglx, creator, create_time, editor, edit_time from ${dbSchemal3}ckx_biangjlb where 1=1

SELECT USERCENTER, JISZQ, DINGDH, HETH, DINGDLX, GONGYSDM, GONGYSLX, CHULLX, DINGDZT, DINGDSXCZR, DINGDSXSJ, DINGDFSSJ, SHIFFSGYS, BEIZ, DINGDJSSJ, DINGDNR, ZIYHQRQ, FAHZQ, MAOXQBC, JISLX, SHIFZFSYHL, SHIFYJSYHL, ACTIVE FROM ${dbSchemal3}XQJS_DINGD d WHERE DINGDZT='4' and (d.dingdlx <> '3' and d.dingdlx <> '5' and d.dingdlx <> '6' and d.dingdlx <> '7' and d.dingdlx <> '8')

SELECT USERCENTER, JISZQ, DINGDH, HETH, DINGDLX, GONGYSDM, GONGYSLX, CHULLX, DINGDZT, DINGDSXCZR, DINGDSXSJ, DINGDFSSJ, SHIFFSGYS, BEIZ, DINGDJSSJ, DINGDNR, ZIYHQRQ, FAHZQ, MAOXQBC, JISLX, SHIFZFSYHL, SHIFYJSYHL, ACTIVE FROM ${dbSchemal3}XQJS_DINGD WHERE DINGDZT='4' and( DINGDLX='5'OR DINGDLX='6')

SELECT USERCENTER, JISZQ, DINGDH, HETH, DINGDLX, GONGYSDM, GONGYSLX, CHULLX, DINGDZT, DINGDSXCZR, DINGDSXSJ, DINGDFSSJ, SHIFFSGYS, BEIZ, DINGDJSSJ, DINGDNR, ZIYHQRQ, FAHZQ, MAOXQBC, JISLX, SHIFZFSYHL, SHIFYJSYHL, ACTIVE FROM ${dbSchemal3}XQJS_DINGD WHERE DINGDZT='4' and( DINGDLX='3' OR DINGDLX='7' OR DINGDLX='8')
select '' as filler,usercenter,lingjbh,danw,jihy,biaos,zhongwmc,fawmc from ${dbSchemal3}ckx_lingj where 1=1
SELECT USERCENTER C1, GCBH C2, ' ' C3, SUBSTR(GONGSMC, 0, 35) AS C4, ' ' C5, SUBSTR(DIZ, 0, 65) AS C6, ' ' C7, ' ' C8 FROM ${dbSchemal3}CKX_GONGYS

select usercenter, lingjbh, gongysbh, gongyfe*100 gongyfe, '' as filer, uabzlx, replace(replace(to_char(uaucgs,'99999.999'),'.',''),' ','0') as uaucgs, ucbzlx, replace(replace(to_char(ucrl,'99999.999'),'.',''),' ','0') as ucrl from ${dbSchemal3}ckx_lingjgys where 1=1 and usercenter = 'UL'

select t.usercenter as usercenter, NVL(replace(t.riq,'-',''),'') as riq, NVL(t.xingq,'') as xingq, NVL(t.shifgzr,'') as shifgzr, to_char(sysdate,'yyyyMM') as gzyf, NVL(substr(t.nianzx, -2),'') as nianzx, NVL(t.nianzq || t.zhoux,'') as gyzqzs, '10' as gyxs, NVL(y.appobj,'') as appobj from ${dbSchemal3}ckx_calendar_version t, ${dbSchemal3}ckx_calendar_group y where t.usercenter=y.usercenter and t.banc=y.rilbc
select USERCENTER, RIQ, XINGQ, NIANZQ, ZHOUX, NIANZX, XIS, SHIFJFR, SHIFGZR, BIAOS from ${dbSchemal3}CKX_CALENDAR_CENTER where 1=1
select GONGYZQ,KAISSJ,JIESSJ from ${dbSchemal3}CKX_CALENDAR_GONGYZQ where 1=1

select Dingdsxsj,usercenter,lingjbh,gongysdm,shul, to_char(to_date(y.yaohqsrq,'yyyy-MM-dd'),'yyyyMMdd') as yaohqsrq, to_char(to_date(y.yaohjsrq,'yyyy-MM-dd'),'yyyyMMdd') as yaohjsrq,leix,uasl,uabzucsl,uabzucrl,uabzuclx,uabzl,cangkdm,dingdh,dingdhTemp,chullx, to_char(to_date(y.yaohqsrq,'yyyy-MM-dd'),'yyyyMMdd') as jiaofrq, '' as filer, danw from (select to_char(t.DINGDZZSJ, 'yyyyMMddHHmmss') as Dingdsxsj, t.usercenter as usercenter,t.lingjbh,t.gongysdm, replace(replace(to_char(t.p0sl, '99999999'), '.', ''), ' ', '0') as shul, to_number(t.id) vid, (case substr(d.chullx, 2, 1) when 'P' then (select zqMinRiq from (select usercenter,nianzq,min(riq) zqMinRiq,max(riq) zqMaxRiq from ${dbSchemal3}ckx_calendar_version group by usercenter, nianzq) t0 where t0.nianzq = t.p0fyzqxh and t0.usercenter = t.usercenter) when 'S' then (select zxMinRiq from (select usercenter,nianzx,max(t.riq) zxMaxRiq,min(t.riq) zxMinRiq from ${dbSchemal3}ckx_calendar_version t group by usercenter, nianzx) t0 where t0.nianzx = t.p0fyzqxh and t0.usercenter = t.usercenter) when 'J' then t.p0fyzqxh end) yaohqsrq, (case substr(d.chullx, 2, 1) when 'P' then (select zqMaxRiq from (select usercenter,nianzq,min(riq) zqMinRiq,max(riq) zqMaxRiq from ${dbSchemal3}ckx_calendar_version group by usercenter, nianzq) t0 where t0.nianzq = t.p0fyzqxh and t0.usercenter = t.usercenter) when 'S' then (select zxMaxRiq from (select usercenter,nianzx,max(t.riq) zxMaxRiq,min(t.riq) zxMinRiq from ${dbSchemal3}ckx_calendar_version t group by usercenter, nianzx) t0 where t0.nianzx = t.p0fyzqxh and t0.usercenter = t.usercenter) when 'J' then t.p0fyzqxh end) yaohjsrq, 'F' as leix, replace(replace(to_char(t.uabzucsl * t.uabzucrl, '99999999'),'.',''),' ','0') as uasl, t.uabzucsl as uabzucsl, replace(replace(to_char(t.uabzucrl, '99999999'), '.', ''), ' ', '0') as uabzucrl, t.uabzuclx as uabzuclx, t.uabzlx as uabzl, t.cangkdm as cangkdm, substr(d.dingdh, 2) as dingdh, t.dingdh as dingdhTemp, substr(d.chullx, -1) as chullx, '' as filer, t.danw danw, 0 a from ${dbSchemal3}xqjs_dingd d, ${dbSchemal3}xqjs_dingdlj t where d.dingdh = t.dingdh and d.chullx in ('PP', 'NP', 'PS', 'NS', 'PJ', 'NJ') and (d.dingdlx = '0' or d.dingdlx = '9') and d.dingdzt = '4' and (d.shifyjsyhl='1' or d.shifyjsyhl='2') union select to_char(t.DINGDZZSJ, 'yyyyMMddHHmmss') as Dingdsxsj, t.usercenter as usercenter,t.lingjbh,t.gongysdm, replace(replace(to_char(t.p1sl, '99999999'), '.', ''), ' ', '0') as shul, to_number(t.id) vid, (case substr(d.chullx, 2, 1) when 'P' then (select zqMinRiq from (select usercenter, nianzq, min(riq) zqMinRiq, max(riq) zqMaxRiq from ${dbSchemal3}ckx_calendar_version group by usercenter, nianzq) t0 where t0.nianzq = to_char(add_months(to_date(t.p0fyzqxh, 'yyyy-MM'), 1), 'yyyymm') and t0.usercenter = t.usercenter) when 'S' then (select zxMinRiq from (select usercenter, nianzx, max(t.riq) zxMaxRiq, min(t.riq) zxMinRiq from ${dbSchemal3}ckx_calendar_version t group by usercenter, nianzx) t0 where t0.nianzx = to_char(add_months(to_date(t.p0fyzqxh, 'yyyy-MM'), 1), 'yyyymm') and t0.usercenter = t.usercenter) when 'J' then t.p0fyzqxh end) yaohqsrq, (case substr(d.chullx, 2, 1) when 'P' then (select zqMaxRiq from (select usercenter, nianzq, min(riq) zqMinRiq, max(riq) zqMaxRiq from ${dbSchemal3}ckx_calendar_version group by usercenter, nianzq) t0 where t0.nianzq = to_char(add_months(to_date(t.p0fyzqxh, 'yyyy-MM'), 1), 'yyyymm') and t0.usercenter = t.usercenter) when 'S' then (select zxMaxRiq from (select usercenter, nianzx, max(t.riq) zxMaxRiq, min(t.riq) zxMinRiq from ${dbSchemal3}ckx_calendar_version t group by usercenter, nianzx) t0 where t0.nianzx = to_char(add_months(to_date(t.p0fyzqxh, 'yyyy-MM'), 1), 'yyyymm') and t0.usercenter = t.usercenter) when 'J' then t.p0fyzqxh end) yaohjsrq, 'P' as leix, replace(replace(to_char(t.uabzucsl * t.uabzucrl, '99999999'), '.', ''), ' ', '0') as uasl, t.uabzucsl as uabzucsl, replace(replace(to_char(t.uabzucrl, '99999999'), '.', ''), ' ', '0') as uabzucrl, t.uabzuclx as uabzuclx, t.uabzlx as uabzl, t.cangkdm as cangkdm, substr(d.dingdh, 2) as dingdh, t.dingdh as dingdhTemp, substr(d.chullx, -1) as chullx, '' as filer, t.danw danw, 0 + 1 a from ${dbSchemal3}xqjs_dingd d, ${dbSchemal3}xqjs_dingdlj t where d.dingdh = t.dingdh and d.chullx in ('PP', 'NP', 'PS', 'NS', 'PJ', 'NJ') and (d.dingdlx = '0' or d.dingdlx = '9') and d.dingdzt = '4' and (d.shifyjsyhl='1' or d.shifyjsyhl='2') union select to_char(t.DINGDZZSJ, 'yyyyMMddHHmmss') as Dingdsxsj, t.usercenter as usercenter,t.lingjbh,t.gongysdm, replace(replace(to_char(t.p2sl, '99999999'), '.', ''), ' ', '0') as shul, to_number(t.id) vid, (case substr(d.chullx, 2, 1) when 'P' then (select zqMinRiq from (select usercenter, nianzq, min(riq) zqMinRiq, max(riq) zqMaxRiq from ${dbSchemal3}ckx_calendar_version group by usercenter, nianzq) t0 where t0.nianzq = to_char(add_months(to_date(t.p0fyzqxh, 'yyyy-MM'), 2), 'yyyymm') and t0.usercenter = t.usercenter) when 'S' then (select zxMinRiq from (select usercenter, nianzx, max(t.riq) zxMaxRiq, min(t.riq) zxMinRiq from ${dbSchemal3}ckx_calendar_version t group by usercenter, nianzx) t0 where t0.nianzx = to_char(add_months(to_date(t.p0fyzqxh, 'yyyy-MM'), 2), 'yyyymm') and t0.usercenter = t.usercenter) when 'J' then t.p0fyzqxh end) yaohqsrq, (case substr(d.chullx, 2, 1) when 'P' then (select zqMaxRiq from (select usercenter, nianzq, min(riq) zqMinRiq, max(riq) zqMaxRiq from ${dbSchemal3}ckx_calendar_version group by usercenter, nianzq) t0 where t0.nianzq = to_char(add_months(to_date(t.p0fyzqxh, 'yyyy-MM'), 2), 'yyyymm') and t0.usercenter = t.usercenter) when 'S' then (select zxMaxRiq from (select usercenter, nianzx, max(t.riq) zxMaxRiq, min(t.riq) zxMinRiq from ${dbSchemal3}ckx_calendar_version t group by usercenter, nianzx) t0 where t0.nianzx = to_char(add_months(to_date(t.p0fyzqxh, 'yyyy-MM'), 2), 'yyyymm') and t0.usercenter = t.usercenter) when 'J' then t.p0fyzqxh end) yaohjsrq, 'P' as leix, replace(replace(to_char(t.uabzucsl * t.uabzucrl, '99999999'),'.',''),' ','0') as uasl, t.uabzucsl as uabzucsl, replace(replace(to_char(t.uabzucrl, '99999999'), '.', ''), ' ', '0') as uabzucrl, t.uabzuclx as uabzuclx, t.uabzlx as uabzl, t.cangkdm as cangkdm, substr(d.dingdh, 2) as dingdh, t.dingdh as dingdhTemp, substr(d.chullx, -1) as chullx, '' as filer, t.danw danw, 0 + 2 a from ${dbSchemal3}xqjs_dingd d, ${dbSchemal3}xqjs_dingdlj t where d.dingdh = t.dingdh and d.chullx in ('PP', 'NP', 'PS', 'NS', 'PJ', 'NJ') and (d.dingdlx = '0' or d.dingdlx = '9') and d.dingdzt = '4' and (d.shifyjsyhl='1' or d.shifyjsyhl='2') union select to_char(t.DINGDZZSJ, 'yyyyMMddHHmmss') as Dingdsxsj, t.usercenter as usercenter, t.lingjbh, t.gongysdm, replace(replace(to_char(t.p3sl, '99999999'), '.', ''), ' ', '0') as shul, to_number(t.id) vid, (case substr(d.chullx, 2, 1) when 'P' then (select zqMinRiq from (select usercenter,nianzq, min(riq) zqMinRiq, max(riq) zqMaxRiq from ${dbSchemal3}ckx_calendar_version group by usercenter, nianzq) t0 where t0.nianzq = to_char(add_months(to_date(t.p0fyzqxh, 'yyyy-MM'), 3), 'yyyymm') and t0.usercenter = t.usercenter) when 'S' then (select zxMinRiq from (select usercenter,nianzx, max(t.riq) zxMaxRiq, min(t.riq) zxMinRiq from ${dbSchemal3}ckx_calendar_version t group by usercenter, nianzx) t0 where t0.nianzx = to_char(add_months(to_date(t.p0fyzqxh, 'yyyy-MM'), 3), 'yyyymm') and t0.usercenter = t.usercenter) when 'J' then t.p0fyzqxh end) yaohqsrq, (case substr(d.chullx, 2, 1) when 'P' then (select zqMaxRiq from (select usercenter, nianzq, min(riq) zqMinRiq, max(riq) zqMaxRiq from ${dbSchemal3}ckx_calendar_version group by usercenter, nianzq) t0 where t0.nianzq = to_char(add_months(to_date(t.p0fyzqxh, 'yyyy-MM'), 3), 'yyyymm') and t0.usercenter = t.usercenter) when 'S' then (select zxMaxRiq from (select usercenter, nianzx, max(t.riq) zxMaxRiq, min(t.riq) zxMinRiq from ${dbSchemal3}ckx_calendar_version t group by usercenter, nianzx) t0 where t0.nianzx = to_char(add_months(to_date(t.p0fyzqxh, 'yyyy-MM'), 3), 'yyyymm') and t0.usercenter = t.usercenter) when 'J' then t.p0fyzqxh end) yaohjsrq, 'P' as leix, replace(replace(to_char(t.uabzucsl * t.uabzucrl, '99999999'),'.',''),' ','0') as uasl, t.uabzucsl as uabzucsl, replace(replace(to_char(t.uabzucrl, '99999999'), '.', ''), ' ', '0') as uabzucrl, t.uabzuclx as uabzuclx, t.uabzlx as uabzl, t.cangkdm as cangkdm, substr(d.dingdh, 2) as dingdh, t.dingdh as dingdhTemp, substr(d.chullx, -1) as chullx, '' as filer, t.danw danw, 0 + 3 a from ${dbSchemal3}xqjs_dingd d, ${dbSchemal3}xqjs_dingdlj t where d.dingdh = t.dingdh and d.chullx in ('PP', 'NP', 'PS', 'NS', 'PJ', 'NJ') and (d.dingdlx = '0' or d.dingdlx = '9') and d.dingdzt = '4' and (d.shifyjsyhl='1' or d.shifyjsyhl='2') order by vid, a) y where 1=1

select 'SERVXX'||rpad(m.usercenter,35,' ')||rpad(' ',4,' ')|| rpad(' ',14,' ')||rpad('78001H 74',35,' ')||' '||rpad(' ',14,' ')|| '00'||to_char(sysdate,'yymmddHH24MI')||' '||' '||' '||' '||' '|| ' '||'Y' as A, 'DT0900'||'0000001101 '||'34 '||to_char(sysdate,'yyyymmddHH24MI')||' '|| (select to_char(t.qsrq,'yyyymmddHH24MI')||' '||to_char(t.jsrq,'yyyymmddHH24MI')||' ' from (select min(m.yaohqsrq) qsrq,max(m.Yaohjsrq) jsrq,m.usercenter,m.gongysdm,m.dingdh,m.lingjbh from ${dbSchemal1}XQJS_DINGDMX m inner join ${dbSchemal1}Xqjs_Dingd d on d.dingdh = m.dingdh and (d.dingdlx='1' or d.dingdlx='4') and d.dingdzt = '4' and d.shifyjsyhl='2' group by m.usercenter,m.gongysdm,m.dingdh,m.lingjbh) t where m.usercenter = t.usercenter and m.gongysdm = t.gongysdm and m.dingdh = t.dingdh and m.lingjbh =t.lingjbh) ||' ' as B, 'DC1800'||rpad('0002542065479',20,' ')||rpad(5,3,' ')||rpad('78001H',17,' ') as c, 'DC0100'||rpad('0060653931709',20,' ')||rpad(5,3,' ') as D, 'DC0500'||rpad('006065393170900000',20,' ')||rpad(5,3,' ') as E, 'DA0900'||rpad(m.lingjbh,35,' ')||rpad('DPCA',17,' ')||rpad('3',3,' ')||rpad(' ',14,' ') as F, 'DA0100'||rpad(' ',35,' ')||rpad('TRAVERSE AR ASSISE AV D',35,' ') as G, 'DG0605' JLLX7, to_char(m.yaohqsrq,'yyyymmddHH24MI') JFKSRQ, to_char(m.Yaohjsrq+1-1/24/60/60,'yyyymmddHH24MI') JFJSRQ, '+'||replace(replace(to_char(m.shul, '9999999999999.999'), '.', ''), ' ', '0') JFSL, m.danw JFSLDW, '113' JFYYDM, 'DH0200'||rpad(m.dinghcj,17,' ') as H,'' as J, m.usercenter usercenter,m.lingjbh lingjbh, m.dingdh DDH from ${dbSchemal1}XQJS_DINGDMX m inner join ${dbSchemal1}Xqjs_Dingd d on d.dingdh = m.dingdh and (d.dingdlx='1' or d.dingdlx='4') and d.dingdzt = '4' and d.shifyjsyhl='2' order by m.usercenter,m.lingjbh,m.yaohqsrq

select t.USERCENTER as USERCENTER, t.LINGJBH as LINGJBH, t.XUQKSRQ as XUQKSRQ, t.XUQJSRQ as XUQJSRQ, t.CHANX as CHANX, replace(replace(to_char(t.XUQSL, '999999999'), '.', ''), ' ', '0') as XUQSL, t.ZHIZLX as ZHIZLX, t.XUQBC from ${dbSchemal3}xqjs_maoxqmx t left join ${dbSchemal3}ckx_lingj y on t.USERCENTER = y.usercenter and t.LINGJBH = y.lingjbh and y.biaos != '1'
join ${dbSchemal3}xqjs_maoxq q on q.xuqbc = t.xuqbc where 1='1' and q.xuqly = 'DIP' and q.XUQCFSJ between (select b.lastcpltime from ${dbSchemal3}in_zidb b where b.inbh = '1530') and sysdate

select t.lingjbh as lingjbh, '' as filler, t.usercenter as usercenter, t.cangkdm as cangkdm, (case when nvl((t.dingdlj - t.jiaoflj),'0') >= 0 then lpad(nvl((t.dingdlj - t.jiaoflj),0),10,'0') else '-'||lpad((t.jiaoflj-t.dingdlj),9,'0') end) as zysl, to_char(t.ziyhqrq, 'yyyyMMdd') as scsj, t.gongysdm as gongysdm, replace(replace(to_char(t.jiaoflj,'999999999.999999'),'.',''),' ','0') as jiaoflj, replace(replace(to_char(t.dingdlj,'999999999.999999'),'.',''),' ','0') as dingdlj, replace(to_char(t.kucsl,'99999999'),'.','') as kucsl, replace(replace(to_char(FLOOR(t.anqkcts*y.cmj),'99999999'),'.',''),' ','0') as aqkc, replace(replace(to_char(t.xttzz,'999999999.999999'),'.',''),' ','0') as xttzz,'' as gonghlx from ${dbSchemal1}xqjs_ziykzb t,${dbSchemal3}ckx_cmj y where t.usercenter=y.usercenter and t.lingjbh=y.lingjbh and t.cangkdm=y.chanxck and y.gongyzq=to_char(sysdate,'yyyymm')
select usercenter,'' as shengcxbh,gcbh,gonghlx,'' as filler from ${dbSchemal3}ckx_gongys where leix='1' or leix='2' or leix='3'
select substr(shengcxbh,1,3) as shengcxbh,lingjbh,xiaohdbh from ${dbSchemal3}ckx_lingjxhd where biaos='1'
select 'CLI' as cli,usercenter,fenpqh,'0'||substr(shengcxbh,5) AS shengcxbh from ${dbSchemal3}ckx_fenpq

select 'EMBALC' EMBALC, baozlx as baozlx, baozmc, lpad(changd, 4, '0') as changd, lpad(kuand, 4, '0') as kuand, lpad(gaod, 4, '0') as gaod, substr(to_char(changd * kuand * gaod),1,6) as tiji from ${dbSchemal3}ckx_baoz
select usercenter, cangkbh, zhantlx, cangklx, daoctqq, rongqcbh, biaos, wulgyyz, anqkctsmrz, zuidkctsmrz,xiehztbz from ${dbSchemal3}ckx_cangk where 1=1
select usercenter, cangkbh, zickbh, guanlyzbh, zhantbh, biaos from ${dbSchemal3}ckx_zick where 1=1
select usercenter, chejbm, chejmc, beiz from ${dbSchemal3}ckx_chej where 1=1
select usercenter, shengcxbh, fenpqh, fenpqmc, biaos, wulgyyz from ${dbSchemal3}ckx_fenpq where 1=1
select usercenter, xiehztbh, xiehztmc, yunxtqdhsj, shjgsj, gongcbm, cangkbh, tongsjdcs, chulsj, biaos, xiehztbzh from ${dbSchemal3}ckx_xiehzt where 1=1
select usercenter, lingjbh, shengcxbh, xiaohdbh, xianbkc, liush from ${dbSchemal3}xqjs_chushzyb where 1=1
select usercenter, shengcxbh, shengcptbh, shengcjp, weilscjp, to_char(qiehsj,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:MI:SS') as qiehsj, biaos from ${dbSchemal3}ckx_shengcpt where 1=1

select lpad(rownum, 5, '0') JLLX,p.* from (SELECT '000000' SCHMD, y.usercenter FSQDM, ' ' FSQHGM, ' ' FSQDZ, Y.GONGYSDM JSQDM, ' ' JSQHGM, ' ' JSQDZ, '00' FYSCSJ, '000000' FYNYR, '0000' FYSJ, ' ' XXLX, ' ' XXBB, ' ' FBXX, ' ' YZDLC, ' ' LHXXDM, ' ' XXJSR, 'Y' CALDELBS,
'00000000000000000' XXH, '36' XXDM, to_char(sysdate, 'yyyymmddHH24MI') RQSJ,
Y.YOUB LJJSRDM, '10' JSRDMFZDLC,
Y.CHUANZ SYRDM, '5' FYRDMFZDLC,
Y.CHUANZ XSSDM, '5' XSSFZDLC, '78001H' SXSZM,
'3' SCSX,
'+'||replace(replace(to_char(Y.UCRL, '999999999.999'), '.', ''), ' ', '0') UCLJSL, Y.DANW UCLJSLDW, lpad(Y.UCGS,6,'0') YZBZSL,
Y.UCXH UCLX, '92' FZDLC, '1' BZJB,
Y.BAOZXH UMLX, '92' FZDLC2, '3' BZJB2,
Y.LINGJBH GMSLJH, Y.DINGDH DDH,
Y.CHEJ||Y.Cangkbh XHD,
Y.ZICKBH SHD, '+'||replace(replace(to_char(Y.YAOHSL, '9999999999999.999'), '.', ''), ' ', '0') XJFSL, Y.DANW XJFSLDW, ' ' JFRQ, to_char(Y.FAYSJ,'YYYYMMDD')||'0000' ZZJFRQ, to_char(Y.FAYSJ,'YYYYMMDD')||'2359' ZWJFRQ, Y.YAOHLH ZLHKH, ' ' FYRSAFFIRDM, ' ' GMSDWBDM, ' ' FILLER FROM (SELECT t.USERCENTER, t.YAOHLH, t.GONGYSDM, t.FAYSJ, t.JIAOFJ, t.ZUIZSJ, t.ZUIWSJ, t.LINGJBH, t.DANW, t.YAOHSL, t.BAOZXH, t.USXH, t.UCXH, t.UCRL, t.UCGS, t.Cangkbh, t.zickbh, t.chej, t.DINGDH, t1.YOUB, t1.CHUANZ, sysdate, '0' FROM ${dbSchemal3}CK_YAOHL t Inner join ${dbSchemal3}XQJS_DINGD y on y.DINGDH = t.DINGDH and (y.DINGDLX = '1' or y.DINGDLX = '4') and y.DINGDZT = '4' and y.SHIFYJSYHL = '2' Inner JOIN ${dbSchemal3}CKX_GONGYS T1 ON T1.GCBH = T.GONGYSDM and T.USERCENTER=T1.USERCENTER WHERE t.EDIT_TIME between (select b.lastcpltime from ${dbSchemal3}in_zidb b where b.inbh = '1720') and sysdate ) y ORDER BY FSQDM,JSQDM,GMSLJH,ZWJFRQ) p order by JLLX
